                                OrderUpdate orderUpdate)
        Description copied from interface: OrderService
        Updates the order, e.g. the payment state, the shipment state or the parcel tracking data.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        orderId - the versioned id of the order to update
        orderUpdate - the changes to be applied
        Returns:
        a command that needs to be executed to perform the changes

      • createOrder

        public CommandRequest<Order> createOrder(VersionedId cartId,
                                PaymentState paymentState)
        Description copied from interface: OrderService
        Creates an order based on a cart, and deletes the cart. The created order object has the same id as the cart it was created from.
        Specified by:
        createOrder in interface OrderService
        Returns:
        A command request which can fail with the following exceptions:
        • OutOfStockException if some of the products in the cart are not available anymore. This can only happen if the cart is in the ReserveOnOrder mode.
        • PriceChangedException if the price, tax or shipping of some line items changed since the items were added to the cart.

      • createOrder

        public CommandRequest<Order> createOrder(VersionedId cartId)
        Description copied from interface: OrderService
        Creates an order based on a cart, and deletes the cart. The created order object has the same id as the cart it was created from.
        Specified by:
        createOrder in interface OrderService
        Returns:
        A command request which can fail with the following exceptions:
        • OutOfStockException if some of the products in the cart are not available anymore. This can only happen if the cart is in the ReserveOnOrder mode.
        • PriceChangedException if the price, tax or shipping of some line items changed since the items were added to the cart.
